name: Kromasphere
description:
The Evil Wizard has stolen all of the color from the universe, turning every world into chaos. It is up to the nameless ninja to return the color to the world.

You must avoid enemies while finding the orbs that restore color to each world. As you collect each color orb, new paths for you to explore to help you find your way to the end of each level.

Each world provides you with new challenges and enemies, giving you hours of game play. Don't worry, though, there's a password system for you to continue your progress so you won't have to start from the beginning.
